comment: LOL you're another sperg I see. Don't worry I assure you that I'm straight and I don't like kids sexually. I think kids are adorable though and I want to have my own one day and raise them to be upstanding citizens that defend liberty wherever they can. Also me Jewish? LOL you flatter me sir, but again you're wrong.
